english.segment1: Maybe this time, no next time, We'll get our laps/laughs? right, we'll get it right. Will we just do what feels good, And then we know it could cause our souls to drown.
english.segment2: In all the distractions of our lives.
english.segment3: What does it mean to be, From the light in a world that's speechless, From the light in a world of darkness.
english.segment4: What does it mean to be, From the light in a world that's speechless, From the light in a world of darkness.
english.segment5: Insecurities are breeding inside me, And they won't let you go to song, But they won't last against the sword's edge, The blade, the blade cuts right through wrong.
english.segment6: All the distractions of our lives.
english.segment7: What does it mean to be, From the light in a world that's speechless, From the light in a world of darkness.
english.segment8: What does it mean to be, From the light in a world that's speechless, From the light in a world of darkness.
english.segment9: I wanna know, I need to know, I want to know. (What does it really mean to be?)
